content:
@Kris Dekeyser (KU Leuven) since you mentioned OpenShift and running containers as non-root last week, I dug up some links about how we had this working in Dataverse 4.20 and added them to tomorrow's agenda.

It was pretty hacky and we ended up deleting it all when we moved from Glassfish 4 to Payara 5.
Resolving but let's open a new topic when we're ready to talk about this.
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
